title: Royal Family
text:
The British Royal Family

The British royal family comprises the Queen Elizabeth II and her close relations. Queen Elizabeth II is Queen of the United Kingdom and the other Commonwealth realms. She has ruled for longer than any other Monarch in British history, becoming a loved and respected figure across the globe.

According to official sources, the members of the Royal Family help The Queen in her State and national duties, in the achievement of national unity and stability and other very important activities in the areas of public and charitable service.

Well-known members of The Royal Family are: Charles (Prince of Wales) and Camilla (Duchess of Cornwall); Prince Charles’s son William (Duke of Cambridge) and the spouse Kate (Duchess of Cambridge) and the other son Harry (Prince of Wales) and his bride to be Megan Markle.

William and Kate also have three children (Prince George, Princess Charlotte and Prince Louis).
